item.title: Intel's miracle chip could make your gadgets 1,000 times faster
item.description: Intel and Micron say they have a new computer chip that will make your gadgets significantly faster, more durable and able to store way more data. http://money.cnn.com/2015/07/29/technology/intel-3d-xpoint-chip/index.html?iid=EL
